definitions.body: :Job 11:2 multitude, abundance, greatness;—abs. ´[[ר]]: Ge 16:10 +, [[רוֹב]] 1Ch 4:38, 2Ch 31:10 + Job 33:19 Qr (Kt [[ריב]]); cstr. [[רׂב]] Ex 15:7 + ([[רׂב־]] Job 37:23 Baer Gi), [[רָב־]] Job 23:6 +; 2Ki 19:23 and pl. cstr. [[רֻבֵּי]] Ho 8:12 v. infr.;

multitude (c. 125 t.): of pers. Ho 10:13, Pr 14:28, Pr 20:6, Es 10:3 +; of things Is 1:11, Is 47:12, Ez Eze 27:18, Le 27:16, Pr 10:19, Job 11:2 +; = great quantity, abundance Ge 27:28, Ho 9:7 + oft. (2Ki 19:23 Qr [= Is 37:24 Kt ], > Kt [[רכב]] ; 2Ch 24:27 Kt [[ורב]] > Qr [[יִרֶב]]), + (of time) [[רׂב שָׁנִים]] Job 32:8 (Gi; v:7 van d.H., Baer), [[בְּרׂב]] [[יָמִים]] Ec 11:1; = whole number (of bones) Job 4:14, Job 33:19 (Qr; Kt [[ריב]]); esp. [[לָרׂב]] in respect of, for, multitude, in sim., like sand, stars, etc., Jos 11:4 (JE), 1Sa 13:5, 2Sa 17:11 +10 t.; = abundantly, c. vb. (= [[הַרְבֵּה]]) Ge 30:30 (J), Ge 48:16 (E), 1Ki 1:19, 1Ki 1:25, 1Ki 10:10; usu. late Ne 9:25, Job 26:3, Zec 14:14, 1Ch 4:30, 2Ch 9:9 (‖[[הַרְבֵּה ]] 1Ki 10:10) + 23 t. Ch; as pred. c. [[הָיָה]] 1Ch 22:14; = in great numbers, 2Ch 30:5, 2Ch 30:24; nearly = adj. (c.subst.; = [[רַב]]) 2Ch 9:1 (‖[[רַב ]] 1Ki 10:2), 1Ki 16:8, 1Ki 24:24, 1Ki 30:13; [[מֵרׂב]] from multitude of, De 7:7, De 28:47 + 14 t.; abs. from (for) mult. 1Ki 7:47, Ge 16:10, Ge 32:13 (J), 1Ki 3:8, 1Ki 8:5 = 2Ch 5:6.

greatness (c. 26 t.): [[שִׂיחִי]] ´[[מֵר]]: 1Sa 1:16, [[רׂב חַסְרֶָּךָ]] Ne 13:22, Ps 5:8, Ps 69:14, cf. Ps 106:45, [[כּׂחַ]] ´[[ר]]: Is 63:1, Job 23:6, Job 30:18, Ps 33:16, etc.; read [[רׂב]] prob. also (for [[דַב]]) Is 63:7, Ps 145:7; = length of journey (cf. vb.
